chessengine.utils¶

Functions

get_bit_positions(bitboard)

Returns a list of positions in the bitboard which have a 1.

get_file(position[, log])

Returns the file of a position.

get_rank(position[, log])

Returns the rank of a position.

lsb_pos(board)

Clears all but the rightmost set bit on the board.
